title: BEEQ Icons
description: Nx Executor that generates the SVG assets for the `bq-icon` component

assetsFolder.description: Name of the assets folder inside the .zip package

downloadPath.description: Path where to save the downloaded .zip package

extractToPath.description: Path where to extract the .zip package

helperFile.description: Name of the .ts helper file to create listing all the available icons name

outputDir.description: Output directory where to put the .ts helperFile file created

sourceDir.description: Source directory from where to list all the SVG icon files available

sourceUrl.description: Url source from where to downlod the icon package

svgFolder.description: Name of the SVG folder inside of the .zip package
